abstract: Islamic State militants attack two army checkpoints in Egypt, killing at least 15 people.
lead_paragraph: Two simultaneous assaults left at least 13 Egyptian soldiers and two civilians dead, security officials said, ending a weekslong lull in such violence.

headline.main: Militants Carry Out Deadly Attacks on Army Checkpoints in North Sinai
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Egypt: Deadly Attack in North Sinai

snippet: Two simultaneous assaults left at least 13 Egyptian soldiers and two civilians dead, security officials said, ending a weekslong lull in such violence.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
